entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
